mapper.select: SELECT TBL.* FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS no, ( SELECT COUNT(member_seq) FROM MEMBER ) AS TOTAL_CNT, name, member_id, member_seq, member_etc, branch, pnum FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM:= 0 ) dummy, MEMBER ) AS TBL WHERE (@ROWNUM:=0)=0 AND no BETWEEN ( ( ( #{currentPage} - 1 ) * 10 ) + 1 ) AND ( ( ( #{currentPage} - 1 ) * 10 ) + 10 )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( member_seq, name, member_id, member_pass, force_yn, reg_date, authority, member_etc, branch, pnum ) VALUES ( IFNULL( (SELECT MAX(member_seq) + 1 FROM GENERATE_SEQ) , 1 ), #{name}, #{id}, #{pass}, 1, SYSDATE(), 2, #{member_etc}, #{branch}, #{pnum} )
